title: Why In-N-Out Burger puts Bible verses on its packaging
text:
In-N-Out Burger owner Lynsi Snyder has given a rare interview in which she talked about her Christian faith and explained why the company prints Bible verses on some of its packaging.

During an interview with The Christian Post, Snyder said the death of her father at a young age and three failed marriages pushed her toward embracing Christianity.

The calorific goodness of In-N-Out Burger. punctuated via Foter.com / CC BY

"I have leart so much through my broken relationships along with the ups and downs that come through marriage," said Snyder, who maintains an estimated net worth of more than $US3 billion ($4.4 billion), according to Forbes.

One way the fast-food chain has expressed its faith is through its packaging. Consumers may have noticed "John 3:16" printed on soda cups.
description: Owner Lynsi Snyder has revealed the death of her father at a young age and three failed marriages pushed her toward embracing Christianity.
